tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingProjectSchedule (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    completion_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'In Progress'
);
CREATE TABLE Green_Building_Projects ( project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255), project_location VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE Project_Tasks ( task_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, task_name VARCHAR(255), task_description TEXT, task_status VARCHAR(50), project_id UUID, FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Green_Building_Projects(project_id) );

CREATE TABLE green_building_projects (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  estimated_end_date DATE,
  project_manager VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE project_tasks (
  task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  task_description TEXT,
  estimated_duration INT,
  task_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE project (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE task (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    deadline DATE,
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE team_member (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE milestone (
    milestone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    milestone_name VARCHAR(255),
    due_date DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN,
    task_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES task(task_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Construction_Phases (
 phase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 phase_name VARCHAR(100),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 project_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Green_Building_Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Task_List (
 task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 task_name VARCHAR(100),
 description TEXT,
 phase_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (phase_id) REFERENCES Construction_Phases(phase_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Task_Assignment (
 assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 task_id INT,
 employee_id INT,
 due_date DATE,
 status VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES Task_List(task_id)
);
